Name: Lintel of Amenhotep the Second
Description: The lintel, a horizontal beam or stone above a door, is decorated with a figure of the falcon, Horus of Behdet, at the top. Below, two hieroglyphic lines contain the names of Amenhotep the Second, Akheperure, as well as his titles as the King of Upper and Lower Egypt and Son of the Sun. There are also prayers for him to live forever.
